mean_cn: n. 按揭贷款，抵押贷款；  v. 抵押
mean_en: a legal agreement in which a person borrows money to buy property (such as a house) and pays back the money over a period of years
word_etyma: mort死+gage抵押品→抵押品不能动，像死
sentence: He took out a mortgage, meaning he borrowed money to buy his home.
sentence_trans: 他办理过按揭贷款，意味着他借钱买的房子。
